experience: You and Jan both know Mark Zawacki, Lauretta (Laurie) Zerga, and 70 others
You both worked at Charles Schwab
Jan worked at Charles Schwab before you started
Chair of Compensation Committee, member of Strategy and Audit Committees.

Bicycle Financial delivers practical, personalized advice at affordable prices and in plain English. We provide simplified financial planning, friendly education, and easy-to-use tools. Our team has deep financial services expertise and a strong commitment to helping everyday people live better financial lives.
Discussed financial literacy topics on The Four on 2.
Board member of an activation start-up that applies technology to strategic best practices.
EVP Shared Support Svc (Technology, Operations, Offshore, Projects)
Led centralized support services including technology, back and middle office operations, operational risk management, consolidated project management, and offshore services for Charles Schwab.

recommendations: Pierre Samec
SVP Technology EMEA at General Atlantic
July 5, 2011, Pierre worked with Jan in different groups

I worked for Jan when I joined Charles Schwab in 1996, and she later promoted me to Retail Technology. Working for and with Jan over the years has been the single most formative experience in my entire carrier. Jan is the best manager I have ever worked for, providing fabulous guidance and coaching. Jan is a clear thinker, she manages to disambiguate  the mirkiest of situations, and always drives swiftly to her objectives while building very strong teams. A true inspiration. After leaving Schwab, Jan continued to be a great coach and mentor to me.

Phillip Maine
User Experience Design Manager
January 13, 2016, Jan was a client of Phillip’s

I worked with Phillip during his tenure at Spring Studio.  Our start-up, Bicycle Financial, needed a UX leader who not only understood the customer experience, but additionally had a deep understanding of financial services.  We decided to embrace a Minimal Viable Product (MVP) methodology in the early days of our growth and Phillip sheparded us through that.  He did everything from the site map to the wireframes to user testing to creating user flows on account servicing.Aside from being a master of all trades, Phillip is extraordinarily conscientious, detail-oriented, sensitive to the simplicity of design, and a great team-player.  His design solutions are well-thought out including the traditional look and feel but also the process steps that allow the navigation to move seamlessly from one step to another.He’s a strong leader with agendas for meetings, discussions of trade-offs, and a keen appreciation for strategic next steps.  I highly recommend Phillip Maine and would be happy to discuss his capabilities further with interested parties.

Johannes Loutsch
Executive Creative Director
November 20, 2014, Jan worked with Johannes but at different companies

I met Jo as a Board Member of CorpU and our relationship expanded to my work in Bicycle Financial.  Jo is one of the most creative individuals I've met in a long time.  Beyond that, he has that rare ability to get the best out of people on camera.  He consistently exceeds professional expectations and, at the same time, is "laugh-out-loud" funny.  I always enjoy our interactions!

summary: Everything I ever needed to know about life, I learned from the Wizard of Oz. It’s a story about belief against all odds and the understanding that we all can bring forward the qualities we most desire if we believe in ourselves and in others. I’ve worn many hats in my career: economist, technologist, human resource leader, and now entrepreneur; in all of them, I have tried to serve others. I am intrigued with the intersection of technology and people. I am proud to be a co-founder of Bicycle Financial as I want every person, no matter how much money they have, to understand and act on their financial dreams. This is my passion.
name: Jan Hier-King
title: Entrepreneur & Board Member
